name: support
chn: vt. & n. 帮助; 支持, 支撑
example_en: She always supports her friends when they are in trouble.
example_cn: 当她的朋友们遇到困难时，她总是支持他们。
word_family: supporter (n. 支持者), supportive (adj. 支持的), unsupportive (adj. 不支持的)
memory_tips: 词根 'sup-' 表示 '在...下面'，'port' 表示 '携带'。联想记忆：想象一个人站在你下面，帮助你支撑重物。图像记忆：画一个人用双手支撑着另一个人的画面。

image_prompt.main_image: A person holding up another person who is struggling to stand, symbolizing support and help.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of friends cheering for one friend who is presenting a project, showing support and encouragement.

collocations: support system (支持系统); emotional support (情感支持); financial support (经济支持)
